name: Shift Health
headline: Turn manual healthcare process into automated workflows
description: We help large provider groups and hospitals take their most mundane repetitive tasks and turn them into automated workflows. Freeing up healthcare workers to focus on the important stuff, like patients

# Team up with an AI Co-pilot to achieve extraordinary results
# The Shift Health AI Co-pilot uses Generative AI to read encounter notes, generate codes, and explain its rationale helping your billing team move faster and stop underbilling, Automate coding and payment workflows in weeks not months.>20% increase in collections>10x more claims submitted per hour>98% more accurate>1000's of hours saved every year
Our customers see:
70% Less EHR Time
10x Improved Efficiency
1000's of Hours Saved
## AI-powered solutions for medical billing teams
AI for Medical Coding
Automate nearly 80% of coding workflows and streamline revenue cycle processes. Create consistent, accurate, and error-free claims.Our AI-powered coding Co-pilot reads encounter notes directly from the EHR, generates CPT and ICD-10 codes and enters the codes directly in your EHR‍Your coding assistant can work side by side with your top coders or autonomously.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f50e739511da5ae49973282/63fd3a77839ddd388741cf44_Animation-1-optimized.gif)
AI for Payments
AI-powered payments that are accurate and efficient. Let our AI assistant read patient balances directly from your EHR and communicate with your patients on your behalf helping to automate your payment workflows so you can collect more faster.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f50e739511da5ae49973282/63fd3a77839ddd388741cf44_Animation-1-optimized.gif)
[Medical codingDigital workers that fully automate coding workflows and streamline revenue cycle processes. Create consistent, accurate, and error-free coding.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f50e739511da5ae49973282/63fd3a77839ddd388741cf44_Animation-1-optimized.gif)](https://www.shifthealth.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Patient services Digital workers who free up your time so you focus on the important stuff, like patients. Automate benefit workflows, reduce scheduling related calls with proactive outreach. Predict no-shows with 98% accuracy, find coverage gaps, and engage patients in real time. ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f50e739511da5ae49973282/5f578345dab60537133c62b9_02.%20Increase%20Margins.svg)](https://www.shifthealth.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Revenue cycleDigital workers are accurate and efficient. Your revenue cycle team is creative and insightful. Together, they are unstoppable. Increase your team's efficiencies with payment posting, claim status checks, bank statements, and patient billing.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f50e739511da5ae49973282/5f5783b3edb1797973f2a689_03.%20Automate%20at%20scale.svg)](https://www.shifthealth.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f50e739511da5ae49973282/63fd3a77839ddd388741cf44_Animation-1-optimized.gif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f50e739511da5ae49973282/5f578345dab60537133c62b9_02.%20Increase%20Margins.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f50e739511da5ae49973282/5f5783b3edb1797973f2a689_03.%20Automate%20at%20scale.svg)
# See how it works
AI for Patient Services
Free up your patient services team so they can focus on the important stuff, like patients. Automate benefits workflows, reduce scheduling related calls with proactive outreach. Predict no-shows with 98% accuracy, find coverage gaps, and engage patients in real time. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f50e739511da5ae49973282/63fd3a77839ddd388741cf44_Animation-1-optimized.gif)
**01.** Connect
Our platform exposes your most mundane and repetitive tasks to help you prioritize your automation builds and realize ROI in months not years.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f50e739511da5ae49973282/5f5623b61f80e6935232ee94_1.svg)
**02.** Automate
Robotic process automation eliminates the healthcare interoperability barrier. It allows automation to interact with your EHR in the same way your staff does. Create scalable, enterprise grade automations quickly. Use our pre-build templates for even faster results.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f50e739511da5ae49973282/5f58da458828185131860d5b_ill-01.png)
**03.** Innovate
Build automations faster and get more done, no engineering team required! Run your automated workflows on a schedule or on-demand with the click of a button.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f50e739511da5ae49973282/5f58d9f66a3f73e16d4df62e_ill-02.png)
##### Integrations

generated_description:
**Shift Health: Revolutionizing Healthcare Operations through Automation**

Shift Health is a dynamic company founded in 2019 and proudly a member of Y Combinator's Batch S19. Based in Lehi, Utah, and powered by a compact team of just six employees, Shift Health has embarked on an ambitious mission: to transform manual healthcare processes into streamlined, automated workflows.

The company’s focus is clear: they aim to assist large provider groups and hospitals by taking mundane, repetitive tasks off their plates, thereby allowing healthcare workers to concentrate more on patient care—the very core of healthcare. In a field often bogged down by tedious paperwork and manual processes, Shift Health emerges as a welcome ally.

### Product Offerings

Shift Health has developed an impressive suite of tools, branded as AI-powered solutions designed specifically for medical coding and payment processing. The highlight of their offering is the **AI Co-pilot**—which employs generative AI to read encounter notes, generate coding, and streamline billing operations. This tool boasts remarkable metrics:
- A **20% increase** in collections
- **10x more claims** submitted per hour
- Up to **98% accuracy**
- Thousands of hours saved annually.

Their automation solutions tackle coding workflows, allowing for an automation of nearly **80%** of these tasks, which can drastically improve revenue cycle processes. The AI systems also extend to patient services, optimizing scheduling, automating communications, and improving patient engagement—making the healthcare experience smoother for both providers and patients.

### Impact and Returns on Investment

The results speak volumes. Healthcare organizations leveraging Shift Health’s solutions report:
- A **70% reduction** in time spent on Electronic Health Records (EHR)
- A **tenfold increase** in efficiency
- A threefold growth in ROI within **six months** of implementation.

These figures demonstrate not just the technology's capabilities but its significance in enhancing operational efficiency while allowing healthcare professionals to reclaim valuable time for direct patient interaction.

### The Vision Ahead

As healthcare continues to evolve, companies like Shift Health are leading the charge towards automation. By integrating intelligent systems into everyday operations, they're not just improving efficiency; they're advocating for a system where healthcare professionals can prioritize what truly matters—caring for patients.

With its focus on fintech and SaaS, Shift Health is poised for growth in an increasingly digitized healthcare landscape. If you’re interested in exploring how Shift Health can transform your operations, you can visit their website at [Shift Health](https://www.shifthealth.io).

In summary, Shift Health is not just about technology; it's about reimagining the future of healthcare operations—enabling providers to focus more on what they do best: delivering outstanding patient care.
